_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=194, end=200, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=185, end=193, sentimentcategory=3), begin=194, end=200, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: In the P.M. had a moderate breeze at East , which in the Night Veer 'd to the North-East , and was attended with hazey , rainy weather .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=1259, end=1273, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=1254, end=1258, sentimentcategory=4), begin=1259, end=1273, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: At Midnight the wind came to South-South-West , and increased to a brisk gale with fair Cloudy weather , which we made the most of as soon as it was daylight .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=1548, end=1552, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=1542, end=1547, sentimentcategory=4), begin=1548, end=1552, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Cloudy weather ; Winds at South-West and South-South-West , a fresh Gale , with which we made our Course good North-West by West , and distance run from Yesterday at Noon to this day at Noon 38 1/2 Leagues .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=1845, end=1849, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=1832, end=1844, sentimentcategory=4), begin=1845, end=1849, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Had a steady brisk Gale at South-South-West with some flying showers of rain and large hollow Sea from the Southward .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=2289, end=2294, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=2283, end=2288, sentimentcategory=4), begin=2289, end=2294, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Fresh Gales at South , which in the A.M. veer 'd to South-East by South .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=2952, end=2959, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=2945, end=2951, sentimentcategory=4), begin=2952, end=2959, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Gentle breezes at North-East , which in the A.M .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=3250, end=3256, entitycategory=PERSON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=3287, end=3310, sentimentcategory=2), begin=3250, end=3256, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Bowles , Marine , with 12 lashes for refusing to do his duty when order 'd by the Boatswain 's Mate and Serjeant of Marines .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=3966, end=3973, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=3959, end=3965, sentimentcategory=4), begin=3966, end=3973, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Gentle breezes at North-West ; pleasant weather and a Smooth Sea .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=3999, end=4006, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=3990, end=3998, sentimentcategory=4), begin=3999, end=4006, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Gentle breezes at North-West ; pleasant weather and a Smooth Sea .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=4044, end=4055, entitycategory=FAUNA), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=4081, end=4112, sentimentcategory=4), begin=4044, end=4055, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: In the A.M. saw a Tropic Bird , which , I believe , is uncommon in such high Latitudes .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=4354, end=4361, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=4347, end=4353, sentimentcategory=4), begin=4354, end=4361, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Gentle breezes at North-West by North , and clear settled weather .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=4405, end=4412, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=4391, end=4404, sentimentcategory=4), begin=4405, end=4412, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Gentle breezes at North-West by North , and clear settled weather .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=4832, end=4839, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=4825, end=4831, sentimentcategory=4), begin=4832, end=4839, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Gentle breezes from the North-West , and pleasant weather , with some few showers of rain .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=5767, end=5774, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=5752, end=5766, sentimentcategory=4), begin=5767, end=5774, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Light Airs next to a Calm , with Clear pleasant weather ; what little wind we had was from the North-West quarter .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=6213, end=6220, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=6201, end=6212, sentimentcategory=4), begin=6213, end=6220, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Calm serene weather , with sometimes light Airs from the Northward .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=6964, end=6968, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=6958, end=6963, sentimentcategory=2), begin=6964, end=6968, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: In the P.M. had light Airs at North , which in the A.M. increased to a fresh Gale , with which we made the best of our way to the Westward , and by noon had run since yesterday upon a South 86 degrees 15 minutes West Course , 79 Miles .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=7306, end=7311, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=7300, end=7305, sentimentcategory=4), begin=7306, end=7311, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Fresh Gales at North-North-West , with Cloudy , hazey weather .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=8331, end=8335, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=8325, end=8330, sentimentcategory=4), begin=8331, end=8335, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: At 8 o'Clock we wore and stood to the Southward until 12 at Night , then wore and stood to the North-West until 4 a.m. , when we again stood to the Southward , having a fresh Gale at West-South-West , attended with Squalls and dark hazey unsettled weather until 9 ; at which time it fell little wind , and the weather soon after Clear 'd up , which , a little after 11 , gave us an Opportunity of taking several observations of the Sun and Moon , the Mean result of which gave 207 degrees 56 minutes West Longitude from the Meridian of Greenwich .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=9985, end=9990, entitycategory=FAUNA), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=9995, end=10032, sentimentcategory=4), begin=9985, end=9990, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The first of these birds are Certain signs of the nearness of land ; indeed we can not be far from it .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=10535, end=10540, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=10529, end=10534, sentimentcategory=4), begin=10535, end=10540, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: In the P.M. had fresh Gales at South-South-West and Cloudy Squally weather , with a large Southerly Sea ; at 6 took in the Topsails , and at 1 A.M. brought too and Sounded , but had no ground with 130 fathoms of line .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=13741, end=13745, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=13735, end=13740, sentimentcategory=4), begin=13741, end=13745, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: In the P.M. and most part of the night had a fresh Gale Westerly , with Squalls , attended with Showers of rain .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=15480, end=15485, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=15497, end=15521, sentimentcategory=4), begin=15480, end=15485, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The weather being clear gave us an opportunity to View the Country , which had a very agreeable and promising aspect , diversified with hills , ridges , plains , and Valleys , with some few small lawns ; but for the most part the whole was covered with wood , the hills and ridges rise with a gentle slope ; they are not high , neither are there many of them . [ Off Cape Dromedary , New South Wales . ] Saturday , 21st .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=15665, end=15671, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=15658, end=15664, sentimentcategory=4), begin=15665, end=15671, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Winds Southerly , a Gentle breeze , and Clear weather , with which we coasted along shore to the Northward .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=17473, end=17479, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=17466, end=17472, sentimentcategory=4), begin=17473, end=17479, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: In the P.M. had a Gentle breeze at South by West with which we steer 'd along shore North by East and North-North-East at the distance of about 3 Leagues .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=18452, end=18458, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=18445, end=18451, sentimentcategory=4), begin=18452, end=18458, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: After this we steer 'd along shore North-North-East , having a Gentle breeze at South-West , and were so near the Shore as to distinguish several people upon the Sea beach .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=20212, end=20217, entitycategory=FLORA), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=20267, end=20282, sentimentcategory=4), begin=20212, end=20217, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: As far as we could see the Trees in this Country hath all the appearance of being stout and lofty .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=20521, end=20527, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=20514, end=20520, sentimentcategory=4), begin=20521, end=20527, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: In the P.M. had a Gentle breeze at East , which in the night veer 'd to North-East and North .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=21522, end=21528, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=21515, end=21521, sentimentcategory=4), begin=21522, end=21528, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Stood to the North-East until Noon , having a Gentle breeze at North-West , at which time we Tack 'd and stood to the Westward , being then , by observation , in the Latitude of 35 degrees 10 minutes South and Longitude 208 degrees 51 minutes West .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=22225, end=22231, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=22219, end=22224, sentimentcategory=4), begin=22225, end=22231, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: In the P.M. had a fresh breeze at North-West until 3 o'Clock , at which time it came to West , and we Tack 'd and stood to the Northward .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=22689, end=22693, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=22668, end=22688, sentimentcategory=4), begin=22689, end=22693, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: At 3 A.M. made sail again to the Northward , having the advantage of a fresh Gale at South-West .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=23114, end=23124, entitycategory=LOCATION), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=23341, end=23424, sentimentcategory=2), begin=23114, end=23124, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: George the Shore seems to form a bay , * ( * Jervis Bay , a very fine port , but little use has been made of it up to the present time . ) which appear 'd to be shelter 'd from the North-East winds ; but as we had the wind it was not in my power to look into it , and the appearance was not favourable enough to induce me to loose time in beating up to it .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=23139, end=23143, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=23129, end=23138, sentimentcategory=4), begin=23139, end=23143, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: George the Shore seems to form a bay , * ( * Jervis Bay , a very fine port , but little use has been made of it up to the present time . ) which appear 'd to be shelter 'd from the North-East winds ; but as we had the wind it was not in my power to look into it , and the appearance was not favourable enough to induce me to loose time in beating up to it .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=NULL, begin=476, end=481, entitycategory=PERSON, sentimentcategory=3), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=482, end=505, sentimentcategory=3), begin=476, end=481, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text:
Des groupes nombreux de dames noires au
masque blanc.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=NULL, begin=522, end=529, entitycategory=PERSON, sentimentcategory=4), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=530, end=587, sentimentcategory=4), begin=522, end=529, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text:
Et surtout des enfants adorables, drôlement habillés comme
de grandes personnes; petits garçons en longue robe et trop haut bonnet;
petites filles aux yeux peints, jolies comme des poupées, en veste à
basques retombantes, jupe courte et culotte par-dessous.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=782, end=791, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=797, end=823, sentimentcategory=2), begin=782, end=791, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text:
Au suivant carrefour, qui montre une vétusté caduque, des groupes
stationnent auprès de la fontaine: assis sur le bord de la vasque de
marbre, un vieux derviche est là qui prêche, tout blanc de barbe et de
cheveux dans le rayon qui tombe du haut de la coupole, l'air d'avoir
cent ans, et, du bout de ses doigts décharnés, tenant une rose.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=863, end=871, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=NULL, begin=897, end=914, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM, sentimentcategory=3), begin=863, end=871, linktype=refers_to)

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=925, end=933, entitycategory=PERSON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=919, end=924, sentimentcategory=3), begin=925, end=933, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text:

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=NULL, begin=1669, end=1678, entitycategory=PERSON, sentimentcategory=3), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=1694, end=1769, sentimentcategory=2), begin=1669, end=1678, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text:
Les
marchands, presque tous, sont des vieillards à la barbe neigeuse,
accroupis dans des niches sombres, chacun tenant sa petite balance pour
peser les turquoises et chacun poursuivant son rêve que les acheteurs ne
viennent guère troubler.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=2097, end=2104, entitycategory=LOCATION), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=2105, end=2125, sentimentcategory=1), begin=2097, end=2104, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text:
Nous finissons la journée dans un Ispahan de ruines et de mort, qui se
fait de plus en plus lugubre à mesure que le soleil baisse.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=2097, end=2104, entitycategory=LOCATION), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=2140, end=2163, entitycategory=LOCATION, sentimentcategory=2), begin=2097, end=2104, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text:
Nous finissons la journée dans un Ispahan de ruines et de mort, qui se
fait de plus en plus lugubre à mesure que le soleil baisse.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=2394, end=2401, entitycategory=LOCATION), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=2402, end=2463, sentimentcategory=1), begin=2394, end=2401, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text:
Ispahan ne s'est plus
relevée après cette seconde terrible tourmente, qui réduisit ses
habitants, de sept cent mille qu'ils étaient, à soixante milliers à
peine; et d'ailleurs Kerim-Khan, presque aussitôt, consacra sa déchéance
en transportant à Chiraz la capitale de l'Empire.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=3485, end=3499, entitycategory=WEATHER, sentimentcategory=4), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=3504, end=3519, sentimentcategory=4), begin=3485, end=3499, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text:
Cependant des fleurs
de mai, des marguerites, des pieds-d'alouette, des coquelicots, des
églantines blanches forment des petits jardins partout, sur le faîte des
murs; le déclin du jour est limpide et doré; les neiges lointaines,
là-bas sur les cimes, deviennent délicieusement roses; au-dessus de
cette désolation, la fête de lumière bat son plein à l'approche du soir.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=3525, end=3531, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=3578, end=3598, sentimentcategory=4), begin=3525, end=3531, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text:
Cependant des fleurs
de mai, des marguerites, des pieds-d'alouette, des coquelicots, des
églantines blanches forment des petits jardins partout, sur le faîte des
murs; le déclin du jour est limpide et doré; les neiges lointaines,
là-bas sur les cimes, deviennent délicieusement roses; au-dessus de
cette désolation, la fête de lumière bat son plein à l'approche du soir.

_sentence_text: Le bazar où nous nous retrouvons à l'ombre est celui des pâtissiers.

_sentence_text:
Il
y fait chaud; des fourneaux y sont allumés partout dans les échoppes; et
on y sent l'odeur des bonbons qui cuisent.

_sentence_text:
Beaucoup de bouquets de
roses, aux petits étalages, parmi les sucres d'orge et les tartes; des
sirops de toutes couleurs dans des carafes; des confitures dans de
grandes vieilles potiches chinoises, arrivées ici au siècle de
Chah-Abbas; une nuée de mouches.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=452, end=488, entitycategory=PERSON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=489, end=505, sentimentcategory=4), begin=452, end=488, linktype=sentiment_of)
text: Des groupes nombreux de dames noires
_sentence_text:
Des groupes nombreux de dames noires au
masque blanc.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=518, end=529), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=541, end=587, sentimentcategory=4), begin=518, end=529, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text:
Et surtout des enfants adorables, drôlement habillés comme
de grandes personnes; petits garçons en longue robe et trop haut bonnet;
petites filles aux yeux peints, jolies comme des poupées, en veste à
basques retombantes, jupe courte et culotte par-dessous.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=518, end=529), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=530, end=539, sentimentcategory=4), begin=518, end=529, linktype=sentiment_of)

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=916, end=933, entitycategory=PERSON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=1064, end=1095, sentimentcategory=2), begin=916, end=933, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text:
Au suivant carrefour, qui montre une vétusté caduque, des groupes
stationnent auprès de la fontaine: assis sur le bord de la vasque de
marbre, un vieux derviche est là qui prêche, tout blanc de barbe et de
cheveux dans le rayon qui tombe du haut de la coupole, l'air d'avoir
cent ans, et, du bout de ses doigts décharnés, tenant une rose.

_sentence_text:
Ensuite, c'est le bazar des bijoutiers, très archaïque, très souterrain,
et où ne passe personne.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=1669, end=1678, entitycategory=PERSON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=1736, end=1769, sentimentcategory=2), begin=1669, end=1678, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text:
Les
marchands, presque tous, sont des vieillards à la barbe neigeuse,
accroupis dans des niches sombres, chacun tenant sa petite balance pour
peser les turquoises et chacun poursuivant son rêve que les acheteurs ne
viennent guère troubler.

_sentence_text:
C'est
l'immense partie de la ville qui a cessé de vivre depuis l'invasion
afghane, depuis les horreurs de ce grand siège, mis sous ses murs par le
sultan Mahmoud il y aura deux cents ans bientôt.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=2212, end=2230, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=2237, end=2251, sentimentcategory=3), begin=2212, end=2230, linktype=sentiment_of)

_sentence_text:
Ispahan ne s'est plus
relevée après cette seconde terrible tourmente, qui réduisit ses
habitants, de sept cent mille qu'ils étaient, à soixante milliers à
peine; et d'ailleurs Kerim-Khan, presque aussitôt, consacra sa déchéance
en transportant à Chiraz la capitale de l'Empire.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=NULL, begin=2680, end=2712, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=2723, end=2729, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), begin=2680, end=2712, linktype=refers_to)
text:
un parcours de
plus d'une lieue
_sentence_text:
Sur un parcours de
plus d'une lieue, maisons, palais, bazars, tout est désert et tout
s'écroule; le long des rues ou dans les mosquées, les renards et les
chacals sont venus creuser leurs trous et fixer leurs demeures; et çà et
là l'émiettement des belles mosaïques, des belles faïences, a saupoudré
comme d'une cendre bleu céleste les éboulis de briques et de terre
grise.

s'écroule; le long des rues ou dans les mosquées, les renards et les
chacals sont venus creuser leurs trous et fixer leurs demeures; et çà et
là l'émiettement des belles mosaïques, des belles faïences, a saupoudré
comme d'une cendre bleu céleste les éboulis de briques et de terre
grise.

_sentence_text:
Cependant des fleurs
de mai, des marguerites, des pieds-d'alouette, des coquelicots, des
églantines blanches forment des petits jardins partout, sur le faîte des
murs; le déclin du jour est limpide et doré; les neiges lointaines,
là-bas sur les cimes, deviennent délicieusement roses; au-dessus de
cette désolation, la fête de lumière bat son plein à l'approche du soir.

_sentence_text: Yet in looking on his work to-day , beside that of Masaccio , one thinks less , I fancy , of his '' study and fatigues , '' of his structure and technique , than of the admirable beauty of his work .

_sentence_text: The convent , it is true , has been desecrated , and is now a barracks ; most of the altars have been robbed of their treasures ; but the church itself remains to us a very precious possession from that fifteenth century , which in Italy certainly was so fortunate , so perfect a dawn of a day that was a little disappointing , and at evening so disastrous .

_sentence_text: And then , here Niccolò Niccoli is buried , that great book-collector and humanist ; while the barbarians are represented , if only by the passing figure of Martin Luther , not then forsworn , who is said to have preached here on his way to Rome .

_sentence_text: It is strange to think that these beautiful pillars have heard his rough eloquence , an eloquence that was so soon to destroy the spirit that had conceived them .

_sentence_text: The Boboli Gardens , with their alley ways of ilex , their cypresses and broken statues , their forgotten fountains , are full of sadness -- `` Tout en chantant sur le mode mineur , L'amour vainqueur et la vie opportune , Ils n'ont pas l'air de croire à leur bonheur , Et leur chanson se mêle au clair de lune , `` Au calme clair de lune triste et beau , Qui fait rêver les oiseaux dans les arbres , Et sangloter d'extase les jets d'eau , Les grands jets d'eau sveltes parmi les marbres . '' But the gardens of the Viale are in spring , at any rate , full of the joy of roses , banks , hedges , cascades of roses , armsful of them , drowsy in the heat and heavy with sweetness . `` I'mi trovai , fanciulle , un bel mattino Di mezzo maggio , in un verde giardino . '' [ Illustration : THE BOBOLI ] And if it be not the very place of which Poliziano sang in the most beautiful verses he ever wrote , certainly to-day there is nothing more lovely in Florence in spring , and in autumn too , than this Hill of Gardens .

_sentence_text: There , as you walk in spring , while the city unfolds herself before you , a garden of roses in which a lily has towered , or in the autumn afternoons when she is caught in silver mist , a city of fragile and delicate beauty , that is soon lost in the twilight , you may see Florence as she remains in spite of every violation , Città dei Fiori , Firenze la Bella Bellissima , the sweet Princess of Italy .

_sentence_text: This blessed Miniato was first-born son to the King of Armenia , and having left his kingdom for the faith of Christ , to do penance and to be far away from his kingdom , he went over-seas to gain pardon at Rome , and then betook himself to the said wood , which was in those days wild and solitary , forasmuch as the city of Florence did not extend , and was not settled beyond Arno but was all on this side , -- save only there was one bridge across Arno , not , however , where the bridges now are .

_sentence_text: Famous now because there Fra Lippo Lippi lived , and there Masolino and Masaccio painted , it is in itself one of the most meretricious and worthless buildings of the eighteenth century , full of every sort of flamboyant ornament and insincere , uncalled-for decoration ; and yet , in spite of every vulgarity , how spacious it is , as though even in that evil hour the Latin genius could not wholly forget its delight in space and light .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=NULL, begin=14204, end=14210, entitycategory=PERSON, sentimentcategory=4), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=14193, end=14203, sentimentcategory=4), begin=14204, end=14210, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Here , it might seem , we have the end of merely decorative painting , the beginning of realism , of the effect of reality , and it is therefore with surprise we see so facile a master as Filippino Lippi set to finish work of such elemental and tremendous genius .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=14934, end=14943, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=14923, end=14933, sentimentcategory=2), begin=14934, end=14943, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Frediano and the suppressed monastery of the Camaldolese , now a school ; and by this way you come to Porta S.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=15700, end=15713, entitycategory=PERSON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=NULL, begin=15720, end=15724, entitycategory=PERSON, sentimentcategory=4), begin=15700, end=15713, linktype=refers_to)
_sentence_text: Friano and the grain store of Cosimo III , past the houses of the Soderini to Ponte alla Carraia , which fell on Mayday 1304 , sending so many to that other world they had come out to see , and so past the house of Piero Capponi , the hero of 1494 who kept the Medici at bay , and threatened Charles VIII in the council ; then turning down Via Coverelli one comes to Santo Spirito .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=15970, end=15980, entitycategory=LOCATION), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=16002, end=16014, entitycategory=LOCATION), begin=15970, end=15980, linktype=refers_to)
_sentence_text: It was the Augustinian Hermits who , coming to Florence about 1260 , bought a vineyard close to where Via Maggio , an abbreviation of Via Maggiore , now is , from the Vellati family .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=16387, end=16393, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=16569, end=16571, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), begin=16387, end=16393, linktype=refers_to)
_sentence_text: The church was begun in 1433 , and was burned down in 1471 , during the Easter celebrations , which were particularly splendid in that year owing to the visit of Galeazzo Maria Sforza .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=16569, end=16571, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=16673, end=16687, sentimentcategory=5), begin=16569, end=16571, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: It was rebuilt , however , in the next twenty years from the designs of Brunellesco , and is to-day the most beautiful fifteenth-century church in Florence , full of light and sweetness , very spacious , too , and with a certain fortunate colour about it that gives it an air of cheerfulness and serenity beyond anything of the kind to be found in the Duomo or S.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=16569, end=16571, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=16727, end=16740, sentimentcategory=4), begin=16569, end=16571, linktype=sentiment_of)

_sentence_text: It was rebuilt , however , in the next twenty years from the designs of Brunellesco , and is to-day the most beautiful fifteenth-century church in Florence , full of light and sweetness , very spacious , too , and with a certain fortunate colour about it that gives it an air of cheerfulness and serenity beyond anything of the kind to be found in the Duomo or S.

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=17378, end=17384, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=17413, end=17421, sentimentcategory=4), begin=17378, end=17384, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The convent , it is true , has been desecrated , and is now a barracks ; most of the altars have been robbed of their treasures ; but the church itself remains to us a very precious possession from that fifteenth century , which in Italy certainly was so fortunate , so perfect a dawn of a day that was a little disappointing , and at evening so disastrous .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=17962, end=17968, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=NULL, begin=17990, end=18007, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM, sentimentcategory=4), begin=17962, end=17968, linktype=refers_to)
_sentence_text: What is left to us of that far-away flower-like beauty of fifteenth-century painting and sculpture will be found in the great transept , that makes of the church a cross of light , a temple of the sun .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=18605, end=18614, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=18619, end=18626, sentimentcategory=4), begin=18605, end=18614, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The sacristy is beautiful , built by Giovanni da Sangallo , and the cloisters now spoiled are the work of Ammanati .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=18670, end=18685, entitycategory=PERSON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=NULL, begin=18709, end=18723, entitycategory=PERSON, sentimentcategory=3), begin=18670, end=18685, linktype=refers_to)
_sentence_text: And then , here Niccolò Niccoli is buried , that great book-collector and humanist ; while the barbarians are represented , if only by the passing figure of Martin Luther , not then forsworn , who is said to have preached here on his way to Rome .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=NULL, begin=18709, end=18723, entitycategory=PERSON, sentimentcategory=3), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=18703, end=18708, sentimentcategory=4), begin=18709, end=18723, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: And then , here Niccolò Niccoli is buried , that great book-collector and humanist ; while the barbarians are represented , if only by the passing figure of Martin Luther , not then forsworn , who is said to have preached here on his way to Rome .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=19098, end=19114, entitycategory=LOCATION), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=19270, end=19272, entitycategory=LOCATION), begin=19098, end=19114, linktype=refers_to)
_sentence_text: Spirito is Palazzo Guadagni , built for Ranieri Dei at the end of the fifteenth century by Cronaca .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=961, end=972, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=955, end=960, sentimentcategory=4), begin=961, end=972, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: They made excellent progress , passing Mount Melbourne on February 6 , approaching near enough to the coast opposite to Mount Terror to permit them to land , after which they steamed along the great ice-barrier until they found an opening , into which they steamed , so as to enable a sledge party to land and push forward to the South .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=1406, end=1411, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=1400, end=1405, sentimentcategory=3), begin=1406, end=1411, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The party landed at a small beach which lay under cliffs towering five hundred feet above .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=1725, end=1730, entitycategory=NAT_PHENOMENON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=1696, end=1702, sentimentcategory=2), begin=1725, end=1730, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Those on shore feared for the moment that a slide had begun in the cliffs over their heads ; but it was not the rocks that were moving .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=1827, end=1834, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=1820, end=1826, sentimentcategory=4), begin=1827, end=1834, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: A mighty glacier , which entered the sea near where they were standing , was shedding an iceberg from the parent mass , and the noise was caused by the rending of the ice as the millions of tons mass tore itself free .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=2379, end=2384, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=2375, end=2378, sentimentcategory=2), begin=2379, end=2384, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Pressing themselves against the face of the cliff at the highest point they could reach , they held on for dear life while the icy water surged up and over them .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=3861, end=3866, entitycategory=LOCATION), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=3854, end=3860, sentimentcategory=3), begin=3861, end=3866, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Towards the end of the last century there was a distinct revival , in European scientific circles , of interest in the still unsolved problems of the frozen South .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=4332, end=4342, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=4386, end=4425, sentimentcategory=4), begin=4332, end=4342, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The achievements of the Ross expedition , which had satisfied public curiosity for the time being , now only stimulated curiosity as to how much more could be ascertained by the use of modern steamships and all the other improved appliances that had done so much to help in Arctic work .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=4481, end=4488, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=4527, end=4554, sentimentcategory=4), begin=4481, end=4488, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: For a time private enterprise operated , and several vessels were despatched , from time to time , some with excellent results ; but something more than private enterprise , working individually , was required if all the benefits of a thorough exploration were to be obtained .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=4960, end=4964, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=4965, end=4999, sentimentcategory=3), begin=4960, end=4964, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The evidence collected pointed to the existence , still further to the south , of an area of land approaching continental dimensions .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=5816, end=5824, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=5868, end=5935, sentimentcategory=1), begin=5816, end=5824, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: During the winter they had a period of seventy days' darkness , spent on board , the effect of which was extremely depressing to their spirits and injurious to their health .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=7439, end=7449, entitycategory=PERSON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=7471, end=7517, sentimentcategory=2), begin=7439, end=7449, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The Germans did so , but both the Swedes and the British were unable to carry out this part of the programme , the former in consequence of the loss of their ship in the ice , the latter because their ship was hard and fast in the southern ice .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=7454, end=7465, entitycategory=PERSON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=7471, end=7517, sentimentcategory=2), begin=7454, end=7465, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The Germans did so , but both the Swedes and the British were unable to carry out this part of the programme , the former in consequence of the loss of their ship in the ice , the latter because their ship was hard and fast in the southern ice .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=7655, end=7666, entitycategory=PERSON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=7672, end=7686, sentimentcategory=4), begin=7655, end=7666, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The Germans were more fortunate in escaping the ill effects of what was an unusually severe ice season ; but the other nations , by the longer stay they had in the frozen regions , were able to return with a much more comprehensive collection of information .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=8084, end=8095, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=8096, end=8139, sentimentcategory=2), begin=8084, end=8095, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The ice barrier prevented her reaching a very high latitude , but the connection between Knox Land and Kemp Land , appearing as isolated coasts on the old maps , was proved .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=8310, end=8313, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=NULL, begin=8362, end=8372, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), begin=8310, end=8313, linktype=refers_to)
_sentence_text: On this land , during the winter , large quantities of ice are formed , to drift out to sea in the form of huge packs which effectually guard the shore from intrusion .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=8614, end=8624, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=8599, end=8605, sentimentcategory=3), begin=8614, end=8624, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: This led them to a rugged , steep coast line , occupying the position of what Ross had defined in 1841 as `` ice cliffs . '' The land was too high and steep to permit them to land , and the ship , becoming involved in the ice within sight of it , winter quarters were established on the ice .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=8614, end=8624, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=8608, end=8613, sentimentcategory=3), begin=8614, end=8624, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: This led them to a rugged , steep coast line , occupying the position of what Ross had defined in 1841 as `` ice cliffs . '' The land was too high and steep to permit them to land , and the ship , becoming involved in the ice within sight of it , winter quarters were established on the ice .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=8709, end=8713, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=8718, end=8736, sentimentcategory=2), begin=8709, end=8713, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: This led them to a rugged , steep coast line , occupying the position of what Ross had defined in 1841 as `` ice cliffs . '' The land was too high and steep to permit them to land , and the ship , becoming involved in the ice within sight of it , winter quarters were established on the ice .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=8880, end=8885, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=8886, end=8913, sentimentcategory=2), begin=8880, end=8885, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Severe gales hampered them in their work , but otherwise the winter passed without any untoward incidents .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=9160, end=9167, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=9154, end=9159, sentimentcategory=3), begin=9160, end=9167, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The interior of the land was entirely covered , so far as could be seen , by a solid ice-cap forming one of the most extensive glacial regions now known to exist .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=9160, end=9167, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=9168, end=9236, sentimentcategory=4), begin=9160, end=9167, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The interior of the land was entirely covered , so far as could be seen , by a solid ice-cap forming one of the most extensive glacial regions now known to exist .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=9800, end=9805, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=9811, end=9828, sentimentcategory=3), begin=9800, end=9805, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: At the position occupied by the _Gauss_ , inside the Antarctic Circle , it was noticed that the prevailing winds were from east to west .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=10134, end=10143, entitycategory=PERSON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=10144, end=10178, sentimentcategory=4), begin=10134, end=10143, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: At the expiration of the period allotted to them for their stay , the explorers were able to get free from the ice , and return to Germany .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=12896, end=12900, entitycategory=LOCATION), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=12907, end=12970, sentimentcategory=2), begin=12896, end=12900, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The resources of the ice world , at either pole , are too vast to be overcome without a fierce and prolonged struggle .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=14136, end=14139, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=14156, end=14185, sentimentcategory=2), begin=14136, end=14139, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The state of the ice , however , was not favourable to this scheme , and , by the time Seymour Island was sighted , it was evident there was little chance of working into more southern latitudes .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=15234, end=15248, entitycategory=LOCATION), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=15249, end=15317, sentimentcategory=2), begin=15234, end=15248, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: A brief visit to Seymour Island did not reveal the wealth of fossil-bearing strata that was expected .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=15374, end=15378, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=15353, end=15373, sentimentcategory=4), begin=15374, end=15378, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Paulet Island was visited and an interesting circular lake was discovered , lying in a circular range of hills .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=15416, end=15430, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=15407, end=15415, sentimentcategory=3), begin=15416, end=15430, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Paulet Island was visited and an interesting circular lake was discovered , lying in a circular range of hills .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=15437, end=15454, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=15455, end=15475, sentimentcategory=4), begin=15437, end=15454, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The banks of the lake bore ample evidences that at one time there had been great volcanic activity at the place , and the lake was evidently formed in the hollow of the extinct crater .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=15514, end=15531, entitycategory=NAT_PHENOMENON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=15508, end=15513, sentimentcategory=3), begin=15514, end=15531, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The banks of the lake bore ample evidences that at one time there had been great volcanic activity at the place , and the lake was evidently formed in the hollow of the extinct crater .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=15885, end=15890, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=15872, end=15884, sentimentcategory=1), begin=15885, end=15890, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The place did not appeal to them as a site for the winter station , and , as further journeys revealed another island on the other side of Seymour Island , where there was a beach which appeared to be sheltered from the southward , the point whence the most violent winds blew , it was decided to build the hut there .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=NULL, begin=16636, end=16639, entitycategory=PERSON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=16624, end=16635, sentimentcategory=4), begin=16636, end=16639, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: In the course of a week , the _Antarctica_ was able to get into the bay again and to land the remaining stores ; but by that time the hut was up and the adventurous six were almost settled down to their routine work .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=17336, end=17343, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=17326, end=17335, sentimentcategory=3), begin=17336, end=17343, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: At an early date they satisfied themselves that Admiralty Bay is a Sound , and that the portion of the continent extending to the vicinity was more in the nature of a group of scattered islands , with deep sounds passing between them , than a continuous stretch of mainland .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=17542, end=17548, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=17565, end=17606, sentimentcategory=4), begin=17542, end=17548, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The microscopical examination of the soil revealed the presence of numerous bacteria , while the examination of the waters showed that the lower forms of life were well represented .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=18018, end=18023, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=18071, end=18111, sentimentcategory=3), begin=18018, end=18023, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Gales came from the south-west for days together and blew with a velocity that was astounding .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=18414, end=18419, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=18424, end=18430, sentimentcategory=4), begin=18414, end=18419, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: When the boat was found , after the storm had abated , it was lying keel upwards , with the greater part of one side smashed in .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=18708, end=18711, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=18719, end=18745, sentimentcategory=3), begin=18708, end=18711, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The air became saturated with electricity to such an extent that the metal parts of the instruments gave shocks to the fingers when touched , while the tips of a man 's fingers glowed with luminosity when outside the hut in the dark .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=19167, end=19172, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=19154, end=19166, sentimentcategory=3), begin=19167, end=19172, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: As a similar thing occurs in the Sahara during the progress of a simoon or sand-storm , it was considered that the amount of electricity was caused by the friction set up by the particles of snow carried along in a never-ending cloud by the gale .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=19270, end=19274, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=19257, end=19269, sentimentcategory=1), begin=19270, end=19274, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: An extra severe gale carrying away the wind-gauge , it was not possible to keep a complete record of the velocity of the gales , but from the records secured , it was demonstrated that , during the first half of June , if the hut had travelled with the same velocity as the wind rushed past it , a distance of 14,900 miles would have been covered , or as far as from the hut to Sweden and half-way back .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=19706, end=19709, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=19726, end=19740, sentimentcategory=2), begin=19706, end=19709, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: As winter approached , the storms obscured the sky and the sun was not often seen .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=19718, end=19721, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=19726, end=19740, sentimentcategory=2), begin=19718, end=19721, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: As winter approached , the storms obscured the sky and the sun was not often seen .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=20333, end=20336, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=20337, end=20362, sentimentcategory=4), begin=20333, end=20336, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The sky gleams with a darker blue , and across it float long streamers of ribbon-like clouds , which shine and flame in red .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=20415, end=20421, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=20403, end=20414, sentimentcategory=4), begin=20415, end=20421, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The sky gleams with a darker blue , and across it float long streamers of ribbon-like clouds , which shine and flame in red .

_sentence_text: The sky gleams with a darker blue , and across it float long streamers of ribbon-like clouds , which shine and flame in red .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=NULL, begin=20471, end=20478, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=20479, end=20502, sentimentcategory=2), begin=20471, end=20478, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: But ever in the colours there is something pale , a paleness which predominates with indescribable delicateness of tone in the tints of the horizon , and in the blue and white shades of the stretches of land , which contrast so strongly with the dull brown of our immediate neighbourhood , and even with the sharply defined ice wall of Snow Hill .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=NULL, begin=20471, end=20478, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=20522, end=20602, sentimentcategory=4), begin=20471, end=20478, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: But ever in the colours there is something pale , a paleness which predominates with indescribable delicateness of tone in the tints of the horizon , and in the blue and white shades of the stretches of land , which contrast so strongly with the dull brown of our immediate neighbourhood , and even with the sharply defined ice wall of Snow Hill .

_sentence_text: But ever in the colours there is something pale , a paleness which predominates with indescribable delicateness of tone in the tints of the horizon , and in the blue and white shades of the stretches of land , which contrast so strongly with the dull brown of our immediate neighbourhood , and even with the sharply defined ice wall of Snow Hill .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=21061, end=21073, entitycategory=WEATHER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=21040, end=21060, sentimentcategory=3), begin=21061, end=21073, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: At about ten o'clock a glowing spot begins to be visible on the horizon , and , presaged by a perpendicular pillar of fire , there rises what would be the orb of the sun , but which , in consequence of refraction , appears to us to be a broad flaming moving belt of fire .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=21151, end=21156, entitycategory=NAT_PHENOMENON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=21114, end=21150, sentimentcategory=4), begin=21151, end=21156, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: On each side of the sun there are two shining , intensely rainbow-coloured belts , forming parts of a ring , which , however , can be seen but imperfectly .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=21701, end=21704, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=21689, end=21700, sentimentcategory=2), begin=21701, end=21704, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: On this , and other journeys , they succeeded in travelling long distances over what was often heavy ice , on two meals a day .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=22511, end=22516, entitycategory=LAND_COVER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=22497, end=22510, sentimentcategory=3), begin=22511, end=22516, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: After climbing the ice ridges , which rose along the shores of the mainland , they succeeded in reaching the land itself on October 18 , though the only evidence of it was the appearance of some dark-coloured rocks which showed above the ice .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=22861, end=22868, entitycategory=NAT_PHENOMENON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=22851, end=22860, sentimentcategory=4), begin=22861, end=22868, linktype=refers_to)
_sentence_text: Other shorter trips taken over the islands in the vicinity of Snow Hill Island resulted in the discovery of important fossils , including the bones of an unknown vertebrate animal , some mammoth penguins , as well as the leaves of different kinds of pine trees and several ferns .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=25555, end=25558, entitycategory=HUM_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=25543, end=25554, sentimentcategory=3), begin=25555, end=25558, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Before proceeding over the ice to the station the three built a small stone hut , where they stored the greater portion of the stores , and with the remainder on their sledge they started on their march .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=25692, end=25695, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=25713, end=25750, sentimentcategory=2), begin=25692, end=25695, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: But the ice , which had been too compact for the ship to penetrate , was not compact enough for them to traverse .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=25692, end=25695, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=25757, end=25796, sentimentcategory=2), begin=25692, end=25695, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: But the ice , which had been too compact for the ship to penetrate , was not compact enough for them to traverse .

_sentence_text:
Cook
Language: English
We had reached our destination .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=294, end=304, entitycategory=ORGANISATION), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=305, end=334, sentimentcategory=5), begin=294, end=304, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Pinning the Stars and Stripes to a tent-pole , I asserted the achievement in the name of the ninety millions of countrymen who swear fealty to that flag .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=341, end=342, entitycategory=PERSON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=350, end=355, sentimentcategory=5), begin=341, end=342, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: And I felt a pride as I gazed at the white-and-crimson barred pinion , a pride which the claim of no second victor has ever taken from me .

_sentence_text: Measured at a new crevasse , the ice was sixteen feet thick .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=2982, end=2989, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=2974, end=2981, sentimentcategory=3), begin=2982, end=2989, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The tallest hummock measured twenty-eight feet above water .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=3035, end=3039, entitycategory=LAND_COVER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=3047, end=3069, sentimentcategory=5), begin=3035, end=3039, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The snow lay in fine feathery crystals , with no surface crust .

_sentence_text: About three inches below the soft snow was a sub-surface crust strong enough to carry the bodily weight .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=3141, end=3158, entitycategory=LAND_COVER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=3159, end=3199, sentimentcategory=4), begin=3141, end=3158, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: About three inches below the soft snow was a sub-surface crust strong enough to carry the bodily weight .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=3250, end=3261, entitycategory=LAND_COVER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=3262, end=3280, sentimentcategory=3), begin=3250, end=3261, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Below this were other successive crusts , and a porous snow in coarse crystals , with a total depth of about fifteen inches .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=3383, end=3390, entitycategory=NAT_LANDFORM), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=3379, end=3382, sentimentcategory=3), begin=3383, end=3390, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Our igloo was built near one edge in the lee of an old hummock about fifteen feet high .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=3431, end=3449, entitycategory=LAND_COVER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=3424, end=3430, sentimentcategory=3), begin=3431, end=3449, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Here a recent bank of drift snow offered just the right kind of material from which to cut building blocks .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=3431, end=3449, entitycategory=LAND_COVER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=3481, end=3489, entitycategory=LAND_COVER), begin=3431, end=3449, linktype=refers_to)
_sentence_text: Here a recent bank of drift snow offered just the right kind of material from which to cut building blocks .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=4538, end=4546, entitycategory=NAT_PHENOMENON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=4527, end=4537, sentimentcategory=4), begin=4538, end=4546, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Figuratively , if this position is the pin-point of the earth's axis , it is possible to have all meridians under one foot , and therefore it should be possible to step from midnight to midday , from the time of San Francisco to that of Paris , from one side of the globe to the other , as time is measured . [ Illustration : WHERE ALL MERIDIANS MEET AND EVERY DIRECTION IS SOUTH The Pivotal Point on which the earth turns . * Magnetic Pole ] Here there is but one day and but one night in each year , but the night of six months is relieved by about one hundred days of continuous twilight .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=4708, end=4715, entitycategory=LOCATION), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=4744, end=4766, sentimentcategory=3), begin=4708, end=4715, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: We had reached a point where true direction became a paradox and a puzzle .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=6536, end=6544, entitycategory=LOCATION), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=6526, end=6532, sentimentcategory=2), begin=6536, end=6544, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: On the advance I had told them that an actual `` big nail '' would not be found -- only the point where it ought to be .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=7221, end=7228, entitycategory=PERSON), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=7180, end=7210, sentimentcategory=3), begin=7221, end=7228, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The naive and sincere interest which the Eskimos on occasions feel in the mystery of the spirit-world gives them an imaginative appreciation of nature often in excess of that of the more material and skeptical Caucasian .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=7429, end=7434, entitycategory=LOCATION), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=7418, end=7428, sentimentcategory=4), begin=7429, end=7434, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: Arriving at the mysterious place where , they felt , something should happen , their imagination now forced an expression of disappointment .

_sentence_text: In one place the rising vapor proved to be the breath of the great submarine god -- the `` _Ko-Koyah_ . '' In another place , a motionless little cloud marked the land in which dwelt the `` _Turnah-huch-suak_ , '' the great Land God , and the air spirits were represented by the different winds , with sex relations .

_sentence_text: Ah-we-lah and E-tuk-i-shook , with the astuteness of the aborigine , who reads Nature as a book , were sharp enough to note that the high air currents did not correspond to surface currents ; for , although the wind was blowing homeward , and changed its force and direction , a few high clouds moved persistently in a different direction .

_annotation: w.c.Link(Dependent=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=ASPECT, begin=8362, end=8365, entitycategory=LAND_COVER), Governor=w.c.Emotions_Entities(ASP_SENT_NULL=SENTIMENT, begin=8380, end=8393, sentimentcategory=4), begin=8362, end=8365, linktype=sentiment_of)
_sentence_text: The ice and snow were also animated .
